name: Topline Pro
headline: Generative AI powered Shopify for home service professionals
description: Topline Pro (formerly ProPhone) is a Generative AI platform enabling home service businesses to be easily discovered, trusted and booked, directly. The AI-driven interface rapidly and affordably creates a custom, SEO-optimized website along with a application to help sync content to and from local listings, put social media communications on autopilot and enable the business owner to easily get paid online.

founders.name: Nick Ornitz, Founder
founders.description:
Nick is the Co-Founder and CEO of Topline Pro. Nick has a background working and consulting in the construction industry focusing on building technologies. He has focused primarily on go-to-market strategy and sales. He graduated Cornell university with a degree in chemical engineering and has completed one year of Harvard Business School before taking leave to work on ProPhone full time. 

In his free time, Nick likes almost anything in nature including hiking, sailing, skiing and scuba diving.

founders.name: Shannon Kay, Founder
founders.description: Shannon is the co-founder and CPO of ProPhone. Prior to ProPhone, she completed her first year of Harvard MS in Engineering Sciences / MBA dual degree. She has a background in data and analytics and systems engineering. She's an amateur photographer, ice cream aficionado, and swimming enthusiast.

### Frequently Asked Questions
### **I'm not sure a website is worth it... why should I invest in one if my Facebook page is working just fine?**
↑
We are very biased, but in simple terms if your average customer brings in ~$500 a year in business, it will only take getting 2-4 net new customers each year from having a website. We guarantee this and know you will receive a lot of value from your site both directly and indirectly. Not only will a website help you show up to net new customers organically, but it will also help existing customers more easily refer you, enable you to run ads to your page if you would like, and help close larger customers that want to see professionalism in the business they hire.
### **Will my website show up on Google?**
↑
Yes, we index every Topline Pro website to show up on google and follow best practice design for SEO. We will conduct keyword research and include relevant keywords for your industry, add alt tags, meta tags, and header titles to your page, secure an SSL certificate, optimize your page for a >90 score on Google Speed test and provide continuous updates for an active website. Ranking first on Google will be dependent on the time your site is live, how competitive your competition is online in your local area, and offsite developments such as your number of reviews on a Google My Business listing. We do provide blogging to help with relevant content on your website. We do not help with acquiring off page backlinks other than through your social channels. Ranking can take several months to improve, but with our design and automated updates you are in good hands, especially as compared to a developer that makes your site once and doesn't update it for months on end.
### **How are you able to offer a custom website starting at a reasonable price?**
↑
We've built software that allows us to build professional, custom websites faster than anyone else. So, we can offer a reasonably priced website while showing you a sample for free without a startup cost or surprise fees.
### **Do I own my domain?**
↑
Yes! If you ever terminate working with us, we will transfer the domain to you if we purchased it for you and continue to cover the cost until the initial domain term is finished
### **How many websites has the Topline Pro team made?**
↑
We have generated over 7,500 websites in the past 2 years in all 50 states! We are on a mission to help pros in every state grow their business and say goodbye to expensive marketing agencies and lead generation websites.
### **Can I add my business partner or team member?**
↑
Yes! You can add as many business partners and team members to your account as you'd like so that more people can access your dashboard.
### What if I want to cancel my subscription?
↑
That's okay! We understand your business needs can change, but are confident you will find value in the site. If you cancel your subscription you will no longer have access to the website design but still own the domain. The reason for this is because we built the initial website for free and did not charge any design fees.

Allred shares his journey of how he started in auto detailing while working at the fire department and how the business grew rapidly to the point where he had to build a shop at his house. The conversation covers topics such as adjusting the business during the COVID-19 pandemic, focusing on niche services, dealing with dissatisfied customers, and the importance of word-of-mouth marketing. Allred also discusses his goals for the future, which include expanding his team and potentially teaching others in the industry.](https://www.toplinepro.com/</podcast/ep-18-aaron-allred-the-journey-from-firefighter-to-auto-detailing-entrepreneur>)

Hennessey’s passion for landscaping began in his early teens, providing lawn care and snow removal services in his neighborhood. After initially losing interest and attempting a different career path post-college, Joe reignited his passion for landscaping and eventually established Hennessey Landscaping in 2019. The company faced growth challenges, including a trial and error phase and adapting marketing strategies. Joe emphasizes the significance of digital marketing and having a robust online presence for growth. He experienced a substantial learning curve regarding business management beyond the classroom, highlighting the importance of investing in marketing and customer acquisition.](https://www.toplinepro.com/</podcast/ep-33-joe-hennessey---from-push-mowers-to-landscaping-business-owner>)

### Frequently Asked Questions
### **I'm not sure a website is worth it... why should I invest in one if my Facebook page is working just fine?**
↑
We are very biased, but in simple terms if your average customer brings in ~$500 a year in business, it will only take getting 2-4 net new customers each year from having a website. We guarantee this and know you will receive a lot of value from your site both directly and indirectly. Not only will a website help you show up to net new customers organically, but it will also help existing customers more easily refer you, enable you to run ads to your page if you would like, and help close larger customers that want to see professionalism in the business they hire.
### **Will my website show up on Google?**
↑
Yes, we index every Topline Pro website to show up on google and follow best practice design for SEO. We will conduct keyword research and include relevant keywords for your industry, add alt tags, meta tags, and header titles to your page, secure an SSL certificate, optimize your page for a >90 score on Google Speed test and provide continuous updates for an active website. Ranking first on Google will be dependent on the time your site is live, how competitive your competition is online in your local area, and offsite developments such as your number of reviews on a Google My Business listing. We do provide blogging to help with relevant content on your website. We do not help with acquiring off page backlinks other than through your social channels. Ranking can take several months to improve, but with our design and automated updates you are in good hands, especially as compared to a developer that makes your site once and doesn't update it for months on end.
### **How are you able to offer a custom website starting at a reasonable price?**
↑
We've built software that allows us to build professional, custom websites faster than anyone else. So, we can offer a reasonably priced website while showing you a sample for free without a startup cost or surprise fees.
### **Do I own my domain?**
↑
Yes! If you ever terminate working with us, we will transfer the domain to you if we purchased it for you and continue to cover the cost until the initial domain term is finished
### **How many websites has the Topline Pro team made?**
↑
We have generated over 7,500 websites in the past 2 years in all 50 states! We are on a mission to help pros in every state grow their business and say goodbye to expensive marketing agencies and lead generation websites.
### **Can I add my business partner or team member?**
↑
Yes! You can add as many business partners and team members to your account as you'd like so that more people can access your dashboard.
### What if I want to cancel my subscription?
↑
That's okay! We understand your business needs can change, but are confident you will find value in the site. If you cancel your subscription you will no longer have access to the website design but still own the domain. The reason for this is because we built the initial website for free and did not charge any design fees.

generated_description:
### Topline Pro: Revolutionizing Home Service Marketing

**Introduction:**
Topline Pro, formerly known as ProPhone, is a trailblazing startup founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator Batch W21. Based in New York and helmed by a team of 28, the company harnesses the power of Generative AI to streamline marketing for home service professionals. 

**Mission:**
The mission of Topline Pro is crystal clear: to create a Generative AI-powered Shopify experience tailored specifically for home service businesses, making them easily discoverable, trustworthy, and booked directly by consumers.

**What They Do:**
Topline Pro’s platform is designed to eliminate the headaches of online marketing for home service businesses. They rapidly generate custom, SEO-optimized websites at an affordable price. Once established, these websites effectively sync content across local listings, automate social media communications, and facilitate seamless online payments. In more tangible terms, their services help businesses:

1. **Be Discovered** - Generate AI-optimized websites that make a strong online presence.
2. **Be Trusted** - Collect and showcase customer reviews to enhance reputation.
3. **Be Booked** - Simplify the booking process with features like automated messaging and online payments.

In just two years, Topline Pro has launched over 7,500 unique websites across the United States, demonstrating a clear commitment to helping small businesses thrive without the burdensome costs of traditional marketing strategies.

**Services Offered:**
- **ProSite:** A rapid website build service that establishes an online presence in a day.
- **SEO Optimization:** Ensures that home service professionals rank higher in search results.
- **Marketing Automation:** Autopilot social media campaigns optimize online engagement.
- **Payment Solutions:** Built-in payment processing simplifies client transactions.

**Company’s Unique Value:**
Topline Pro's AI-driven approach allows it to offer free initial website samples and low monthly costs—without any hidden fees. Their promise of an easy, user-friendly experience enables business owners to focus more on what they do best: delivering excellent services, while Topline Pro manages their online visibility and client acquisition strategies.

**Team and Leadership:**
Led by an experienced group partnered with Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner, the team at Topline Pro exemplifies innovation and dedication to empowering home service professionals.

**Conclusion:**
In a world increasingly dominated by digital marketing, Topline Pro stands out as a supportive ally for home service professionals in their journey to modernize their businesses. By providing powerful tools to enhance discoverability, trust, and bookings, they are fundamentally changing the game for small service-based companies. Whether you’re a landscaper, contractor, or cleaner, Topline Pro is keen on proving that with the right technology, small businesses can thrive without getting bogged down by complex marketing challenges.

For those looking to supercharge their online presence and boost customer acquisition, Topline Pro is definitely worth a close look.

[Learn more at Topline Pro's official site](https://www.toplinepro.com).
